about.title: About GastroShop
about.subtitle: We source the finest artisanal products directly from European producers
about.description: Our mission is to bring you the most exceptional cheeses and delicacies, carefully selected from traditional producers across Europe. Each product tells a story of heritage, craftsmanship, and passion.
about.qualityDescription: Every product is carefully selected and quality-tested

newsletter.privacy: We respect your privacy. Unsubscribe at any time.
